parameters.name: CommandID
parameters.description: Command ID as defined swCommands_e (see Remarks )

title: ISldWorks.IsCommandEnabled
description: Gets whether the specified command is enabled.

parameters.name: CommandID
parameters.description: Command ID as defined swCommands_e (see Remarks )

returns: True if the command is enabled, false if not
remarks:
Before using this method, you must add a reference to the version-specific
SOLIDWORKS Commands type library
to access the SOLIDWORKS commands.
